Posts.Content: Jan 21, 2010 09:50PM latriciadawn wrote: BoobsinaBox, I love your name!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I am about to have a dbl/mast with no reconstruction this Monday, the 25th of Jan., and look forward to the eventual feeling of "breast free" and not "breastless".  I plan to have plenty of boobless days.  I have thought of vests in the winter and blouses over tees in the summer.  I look forward to getting on this blog again.  I am not looking forward to the recovery time, and probably radiation following, but hope to eventually get back on here.  I am so impressed and encouraged by all that I've read here.  Thanks so much, Latricia
Posts.Title: Wardrobe pics for boobless days mom2two ShadePink
